pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This is a scenic aerial shot of a vast field of sunflowers under a clear, pale blue sky. The bright yellow flowers are planted in neat rows, creating lines that stretch toward a cluster of dark green trees in the middle distance. The shot is largely static, with only a very slow, steady forward drift of the camera over the field.
